competitors.name: Oracle Exadata
competitors.notes: Engineered system for data warehouse and OLTP

competitors.name: Microsoft SQL Server
competitors.notes: Enterprise database with data warehouse capabilities

context: In 2015, Teradata was the leading data warehouse appliance vendor facing cloud disruption. Amazon Redshift (launched 2012) was gaining traction as cloud-native alternative. SAP HANA's in-memory architecture represented new competitive threat. The market was beginning multi-year transition from on-premises appliances to cloud data warehouses. Teradata was developing cloud strategy while defending enterprise installed base. Hadoop ecosystem also competed for analytics workloads.
